title.rendered: Walls of Books Kansas + $5 Puzzles + Now Hiring

content.rendered:
Announcing a new Walls of Books!

Our next Walls of Books store will open in Atchison, Kansas. Keep an eye on our newsletter and Facebook page for more updates. This store is scheduled to open in October.

$5 Puzzles

We have just marked down our entire inventory of adult puzzles. They are now only $5 each! These are high-quality puzzles with an MSRP of $15-$20.

Now Hiring

We are looking for part- and full-time help for our bookstores (store associates) AND warehouse (book sorter/delivery driver/maintenance). Submit your resumes to office@gottwalsbooks.com for consideration.

excerpt.rendered: Our next Walls of Books store will open in Atchison, Kansas. Keep an eye on our newsletter and Facebook page for more updates. This store is scheduled to open in October.
